# Monte Carlo

DATA QUALITY

Monte Carlo is a data observability platform designed to help organizations monitor and ensure the reliability of their data pipelines. It provides automated monitoring, alerting, and root cause analysis to detect and resolve data quality issues in real-time. Monte Carlo supports integration with various data warehouses, ETL tools, and BI platforms to provide end-to-end data reliability.

## Monte Carlo + MotherDuck

Monte Carlo integrates with MotherDuck to offer comprehensive data observability for data stored and processed within the MotherDuck cloud data warehouse. Through this integration, Monte Carlo can monitor data quality, lineage, and performance metrics, ensuring that data in MotherDuck is reliable and any issues are promptly identified and addressed. This seamless integration helps data teams maintain trust in their data and streamline the issue resolution process.
